details: Selfie-focused Android smartphone Display and configurations The Micromax Canvas Selfie Lens Q345 arrives with a large and beautiful 5-inch IPS HD display with 720 x 1280 pixels of resolution. This phone is equipped with latest Android v5.0 (Lollipop) and comes preloaded with a range of apps and features. The phone is powered by 1.3GHz quad-core processor, which performs well with 1GB RAM. Camera and memory The Micromax Canvas Selfie Lens Q345 gets 8MP rear camera and 5MP front camera. Both cameras gets Largan Lens and Sony Sensors for high clarity photos and video capturing. The handset features dual LED flash and 30-FPS HD video recording. It has 8GB inbuilt storage which is expandable upto 32GB via microSD. Battery and connectivity The Micromax Canvas Selfie Lens Q345 is powered by a 2800mAH Li-ion non-removable battery. Data and connectivity options includes FM Radio, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, micro-USB, GPS/AGPS and 3.5mm audio jack. Verdict Micromax Canvas Selfie Lens Q345 is a good option if you are looking for an Android smartphone with primary focus for photography and selfies, and don't want to shelll out a lot for it.
